description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. PercussONE is a heart racing spin on classic puzzle games and the 1st to feature up to 4 players battling it out ON THE SAME GRID creating a never before seen multiplayer experience. Follow the beat and match pieces in sets of 4 to score in 2 modes: Endless Encore - Clear the pieces off the grid before they overflow. Jam Session - Focus on matching and create as many Riffs as you can in 3 minutes.
